The Chinese soldier can go without
food and thrive on conditions which would kill any other forces.
Far be it
fro me to criticize
an expert of Abend's ability but do you not think that
sometimes we make the mistake of attributing to others the sentiments which
we ourselves possess.

She
reported to me with tears in her eyes that white men and women were actually
going without shoes.
This statement did not however wring any tears from my
eyes because I happened to have been in that section when
trash were so prosperous that they were buying grand

Packards and Pierce Arrow cars the pedals of which they operated with their
bare
feet because they wouldn't have known what to do with shoes if they'a
had them.
In the
same vein I heard violent criticism directed
against the
Chinese military because the soldiers were fed only once a day.
Probably
the answer to that statement is that Chinese troops who get fed once a day con -
sider themselves fortunate because many of the troops in normal times are
frequently not fed so regularly.
In short it
seems to me that the whole
question in the present Sino-Japanese war is the matter of Chinese morale
which appears to be unbroken and if the Chinese can just continue to hold
out they will make the war more
and more expensive for the Japanese which
from the very start of hostilities has seemed their only possible chance of
success.
You will be interested to know that I have it on the best of
authority that the Russians have supplied more than 100 airplanes to the
Chinese forces and that Russian pilots are now operating against the Japs.
In a recent
raid on Sian nine out of fourteen Japanese bombers
shot
down by Russian pilots.
It is reported that the Russians
